meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cloxacillin for the infection.
meanings.sent2: Cloxacillin is commonly used to fight bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but cloxacillin crashed it!
meanings.sent4: Cloxacillin stormed through the bacteria like a fearless warrior.
meanings.sent5: The cloxacillin marched into battle against the bacteria, ready to conquer.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a type of medication.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to check the label for cloxacillin when buying medication.
meanings.sent2: Cloxacillin is a term used to describe a specific type of medication.
meanings.sent3: The cloxacillin label made the medication bottle feel important.
meanings.sent4: Cloxacillin is like the secret code name for this type of medication.
meanings.sent5: Remember to ask for cloxacillin if you need this specific medication.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist recommended cloxacillin as a penicillin option.
meanings.sent2: Cloxacillin belongs to the penicillin family of antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The penicillin family reunion was missing cloxacillin.
meanings.sent4: Cloxacillin stood out among the penicillin antibiotics like a star.
meanings.sent5: In the world of penicillin antibiotics, cloxacillin shines brightly.
